Articles.Content:
A nice looking mother-ship, launch junk is not needed since I'm just going to use hyperedit to get it into orbit.

Screenshots would be good too.

Thanks.
I'd suggest you take a look at the Rocket Builders subforum, as there are companies willing and able to take requests, as well as a huge catalog of pre-existing, fully functional craft.

I'd suggest you take a look at the Rocket Builders subforum, as there are companies willing and able to take requests, as well as a huge catalog of pre-existing, fully functional craft.

Good advice, I was actually looking at your company and the MU SX-6 Oracle took my fancy, I don't exactly know what motherships qualify as but it looks like one, download link?

Good advice, I was actually looking at your company and the MU SX-6 Oracle took my fancy, I don't exactly know what motherships qualify as but it looks like one, download link?

Glad to hear! However, the Oracle's actually a heavily armed, high-partcount warship. (With missiles onboard)

I do have another preexisting ship that might meet your needs, though.

The Conquistador-class has 3 variants, and is specifically designed as a mothership.

If you are interested, shoot me a PM and I'll fetch a DL link for ya.

You can also ask on my company thread (if you want to) about having a freshly-designed ship made, as I always like a good challenge.

We have plenty of motherships in the builder forums. For example, my unsc paris class.
